sections.title: Welcome to BCA 2024-27
content: The Center of Computer Education at the Institute of Professional Studies, University of Allahabad, is proud to welcome the new batch of BCA students (2024-27) to our annual Freshers' Party. This event marks the beginning of your exciting journey in the world of computer applications.
Our goal is to foster camaraderie among new students and help you connect with your peers, seniors, and faculty members in a relaxed and enjoyable atmosphere.

sections.title: About CCE, IPS
content: The Center of Computer Education (CCE) at the Institute of Professional Studies (IPS) is a premier institution for computer education in Prayagraj. Established with the vision to provide quality education in computer applications, CCE has been nurturing talented professionals for over two decades.
Our BCA program is designed to provide students with a strong foundation in computer applications while emphasizing practical skills and industry-relevant knowledge.

sections.title: University of Allahabad
content: Founded in 1887, the University of Allahabad is one of India's oldest and most prestigious universities. Known as the 'Oxford of the East,' it has a rich tradition of academic excellence and has produced numerous distinguished alumni.
The Institute of Professional Studies (IPS) was established in 2001 to provide professional education in various disciplines, including computer applications, management, and biotechnology.

contact.address: Center of Computer Education, University of Allahabad
